CustomField.description: The field name to transform from. Fields which hold JSON are always treated like an array of objects, so 0-many records can be created. The only way the Transformation process knows that this is JSON is if the '.' character is included (i.e. Qualification__c.Name instead of just Qualification__c - it knows to transform the Name in JSON from the Qualification__c Field to the target field in the many objects created)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The field name to transform from. When the from field holds JSON ensure to include the JSON field name. I.e. When creating many qualifications held in a 'Qualification__c' field, we might expect to see 'Qualification__c.Name'
CustomField.label: From Field
